You can checkout my other Sundal , link given below ğŸ‘‡ Black eyed beans Sundal Duration: 5 minutes + soaking time 9 hours + cooking time 15 mins Ingredients:
  • Garbanzo Beans / chickpeas/ Senagallu - 160 gms
  • Green chillies - 2
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Salt - 1 1/2 tsp ( to cook beans and seasoning)
  • Fresh shredded coconut ğŸ¥¥- 2 Tb sp
  • Oil - 1 tsp
  • Mustard seeds - 1/4 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Urad dal / Skinless Black Gram - 1/2 tsp
  • Dry Red chilly - 1
  • Hing / Asafoetida - 1/4 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 5
Procedure: Cook Garbanzo Beans:
  • Wash Garbanzo Beans twice under running water
  • Add fresh water to soak beans for atleast 9 hours
  • When beans soaked well, cook them in pressure cooker along with (1/2 tsp) salt and pinch of turmeric powder
  • Cook them for 3 whistles and turn off heat
  • Let the pressure goes down, open lid and strain water by using colander
  • Cooked Garbanzo Beans are ready to use in sundal
Coconut Paste:
  • In a mini mixer grinder add shredded coconut and green chillies
  • Blend it to make smooth paste
  • Keep aside
Process of Sundal:
  • Heat a skillet pan or sauce pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal, curry leaves,Â Let them splutter
  • Then add Hing , turmeric powder & dry Red chilly . Mix well
  • Next add grounded coconut paste and sautÃ© a minute
  • Finally add cooked Garbanzo Beans and give it a toss or gently sautÃ© 3-5 minutes
  • Tada! Fresh and healthy Sundal is ready to serve
